name: amniotic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to the bag and liquid that surround the embryo (= developing young animal) of a mammal, bird, or reptile inside its mother: amniotic fluid An amniotic sac, or amnion, contains a foetus during pregnancy. Other researchers have worked on amniotic cells. See
amnion
More examplesFewer examplesIdentical twins normally share the same amniotic sac and the same placenta. When informed that a patient’s amniotic membrane has broken, the nurse should check foetal heart tones.The doctor collected a small sample of fluid from the amniotic cavity.
